original_title: 美少女限定。(女子校の課外授業で)職業体験中のけなげなひよこ女子、ザ・レイプ！
overview: 3 schoolgirls visit workplaces for their extra-curricular activities and learn about life. But get raped instead.
title: Young Hotties Only. (Extracurricular Studies At An All-Girls School) These Innocent Young Girls Are Getting Fucked During A Work Experience Session!
